channel.description: Tommorrow is 4/20, or known as Green Day by many people. Got any plans for tommorrow? 12 People and I bought a 3 pound sack of some pretty nice and fresh bud, I can't wait to smoke it all! Were also going to do some LSD, shrooms, DXM, and a lot of beer.

item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Urban Dictionary

Urban Dictionary: 420

In 1971, five high school students – Steve Capper, Dave Reddix, Jeffrey Noel, Larry Schwartz, and Mark Gravich – in San Rafael, California, calling themselves the Waldos because "their chosen hang-out spot was a wall outside the school", used the...

So far the majority of you are incorrect. 420's origin IS known. the term 420 originated at San Rafael High School, in 1971, among a group of about a dozen pot-smoking wiseacres who called themselves the Waldos, who are now pushing 50. The term was shorthand for the time of day the group would meet, at the campus statue of Louis Pasteur, to smoke pot. Intent on developing their own discreet language, they made 420 code for a time to get high, and its use spread among members of an entire generation. So there ya go, someone's parents out there invented the term 4/20. And remember this: There are NOT 420 chemicals in Weed. It's about 315, the num. goes up or down depending on what you're smoking. 4/20 is NOT police code or Maryjane. And that whole shit about Holland and 4/20 over there being "tea time" for smokers isn't true either.

I know my shit.

Read full topic

Its 420 because the police code 420 stands for marijuanna bust.

anywayses im never taking drugs… not since that day… flashbacks…

lol i tried to smoke once, that was when i learned that my brain chemistry is ficked up, basicaly, i am constantly high, always have been, always will be, unless i take pills, but im against curing ilness or disorder with pills, if ur sick then you should die!

shit you got me, yea adhd, how the fick did u get that? i always assumed that as a joke, its true then since you guessed my adhd from my description?
